sources.name: BBC Sport
sources.description: The home of BBC Sport online. Includes live sports coverage, breaking news, results, video, audio and analysis on Football, F1, Cricket, Rugby Union, Rugby League, Golf, Tennis and all the main world sports, plus major events such as the Olympic Games.

sources.name: Bleacher Report
sources.description: Sports journalists and bloggers covering NFL, MLB, NBA, NHL, MMA, college football and basketball, NASCAR, fantasy sports and more. News, photos, mock drafts, game scores, player profiles and more!

sources.name: ESPN
sources.description: ESPN has up-to-the-minute sports news coverage, scores, highlights and commentary for NFL, MLB, NBA, College Football, NCAA Basketball and more.

sources.name: ESPN Cric Info
sources.description: ESPN Cricinfo provides the most comprehensive cricket coverage available including live ball-by-ball commentary, news, unparalleled statistics, quality editorial comment and analysis.

sources.name: Football Italia
sources.description: Italian football news, analysis, fixtures and results for the latest from Serie A, Serie B and the Azzurri.

sources.name: FourFourTwo
sources.description: The latest football news, in-depth features, tactical and statistical analysis from FourFourTwo, the UK's favourite football monthly.

sources.name: Fox Sports
sources.description: Find live scores, player and team news, videos, rumors, stats, standings, schedules and fantasy games on FOX Sports.

sources.name: L'equipe
sources.description: Le sport en direct sur L'EQUIPE.fr. Les informations, résultats et classements de tous les sports. Directs commentés, images et vidéos à regarder et à partager !

sources.name: Marca
sources.description: La mejor información deportiva en castellano actualizada minuto a minuto en noticias, vídeos, fotos, retransmisiones y resultados en directo.

sources.name: NFL News
sources.description: The official source for NFL news, schedules, stats, scores and more.

sources.name: NHL News
sources.description: The most up-to-date breaking hockey news from the official source including interviews, rumors, statistics and schedules.

sources.name: TalkSport
sources.description: Tune in to the world's biggest sports radio station - Live Premier League football coverage, breaking sports news, transfer rumours & exclusive interviews.

sources.name: The Sport Bible
sources.description: TheSPORTbible is one of the largest communities for sports fans across the world. Send us your sporting pictures and videos!
